ðŸ“– Summary: Ballista is a distributed query execution engine built on top of Apache DataFusion. It allows DataFusion applications to be scaled out to a cluster of machines, enabling parallel processing of large datasets. The system uses a scheduler and executor architecture and can be deployed using Docker Compose or Kubernetes.
